title: Typophile Logo
content:
Who was first with their logo? Typophile or Austrian television?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172646im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/100_0001_5451.png)

 [‹ Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31147 "Go to previous forum topic") [what goes with Continuum Medium?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31127 "Go to next forum topic")
author: FlorianCH

comments.content:
i guess ORF was first ;) i cant remember them having another one.

offtopic: where from zurich are you? you have email-contact disabled in your profile, i wanted to ask by mail. im living in hottingen ;)

– The ORF-logo used to be red and white, too, wasn’t it?  
Besides, I’m living in «Westside», two blocks from the «Abaton» cinema. And for the rest of the world: Zürich is such a great place.

Florian:  
 Zürich is such a great place.

I’ve only visited the city a few times, but would be willing to move there tomorrow. Perhaps when I’m retired.
